House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07918
FULL TITLE : AN ACT FURTHER AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 9501, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "MAGNA CARTA FOR MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides that private mall and supermarkets shall provide at least 5 % of their selling area free of charge to qualified Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) to increase the access of MSMEs to the domestic market.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, ARTHUR C.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2018-09-04)2. Sangcopan (000 2018-10-10)
3. Tambunting (000 2019-01-22)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-09-25
          -Rep. Carmelo Lazatin II sponsored the said bills on behalf of the authors. The bills seek to further amend RA 9501 by inserting a new provision requiring private malls and supermarkets to provide at least five percent (5%) or ten percent (10%) of their total selling area, free of charge to deserving MSMEs, to be identified by the Department of Trade and Industry. A Technical Working Group (TWG) was created to fine tune the provisions of the substitute bill to House Bills Numbered 7918 and 8129. The TWG Chair will still be determined. In view thereof, HBs 7918 and 8129 will not be consolidated with HBs 4498 and 5540.
          -• Initial deliberation on the bill together with HB 8129 was conducted on September 25, 2018. • A technical working group (TWG) was created to fine tune the provisions and craft the substitute bill to HBs Numbered 7918 and 8129.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-07-30
